Prohibited Uses

2. Services Provided

LookMyCruise is a third-party platform that allows users to browse, compare, and book cruiseservices from various cruise lines.

3. Booking and Payments

Bookings made through the Website are processed by third-party payment providers. By submittingyour booking, you agree to comply with their payment terms.

8.2 Termination by You

9. Changes to Terms and Conditions
